name: Ready Up for League of Legends
name_original: Ready Up for League of Legends
description:
Fast and effective, LoL Ready Up is the best real-time companion app for League of Legends! Appraise your teammates and opponents at a glance, even before the game. Study a summoner's history, down to their individual champions. Return to your previous games and save your best builds for use in future matches. (Or download builds from the pros, updated daily!) Comes with a complete codex of items, abilities, terminology and lore.

LoL Ready Up will have you dominating the Rift with powerful features including:

• REAL-TIME STATS – Quickly find out your opponent’s Tier, Division, Masteries and Runes, then dive deep into their W/L record and previous games as each champion.

• IN-DEPTH MATCH HISTORY – A lot of apps give you match history, but we didn’t stop at a simple overview. We let you see the order of abilities and items that helped your favorite summoner achieve victorious routing of the opposing team. You can even save their best builds to guide you!

• MADE FOR ALL SKILL LEVELS – Pros will appreciate all their most useful data points at a glance, and fresh players are guided to learn more and play better with our build system, terminology glossary, and human-friendly information readouts.

• CHAMPION AND ITEM DATABASE – We have up to date information on all of the champions and items found in the current patch of League of Legends. These information pages are always one tap away from anywhere in the app.

• ALWAYS UP TO DATE – We pull our data directly from the Riot League of Legends servers, so we’re always up to date.

• LANGUAGES - We support 9 popular languages including: English, Deutsch, Español, Français, Italiano, Português, Pусский, Türk, and 한국의

• ALL REGIONS SUPPORTED - Ready Up supports all of the regions served by Riot, including: NA, EUNE, EUW, BR, KR, LAS, LAN, OCE, TR, RU.
